name: Copywriter
description:
We are looking for a talented copywriter who enjoys writing about cutting-edge technologies and can turn complex topics into engaging posts. Please note that Yandex sometimes outsources different functions to partner companies. In these cases, Yandex helps search for suitable candidates.

You are a good fit if you can:

  • Use IT terminology appropriately and concisely;
  • Understand complex technical concepts and write about them both for a general audience and for experts in the field;
  • Plan the structure of a text and choose the style appropriate for the audience;
  • Self-motivate to meet deadlines and see projects through to the end.

Preferred:

  • Native English speaker or bilingual;
  • Experience writing marketing texts, blogs, or technology-related articles.

In this position, you will:

  • Write blog articles, landings and promo pages, social media posts, presentations, newsletters, and other communication with users, clients, and partners;
  • Communicate with project managers, marketing specialists and subject-matter experts to define project requirements and gather information;
  • Dig deeper into new technologies and product features to support your writing.

We offer:

  • Remote work (you provide your own computer or laptop with internet access);
  • Flexible schedule and workload;
  • Project-based payment based on the number and complexity of tasks.
